name: One Ticket To Hell
description:
This is a Demo version, One Ticket To Hell is a game inspired by the likes of : Magic survivors, Vampire Survivor and 20 minutes till Dawn. The goal of the game is to last 30 minutes and Slay the final Boss. With 10 levels of increasing difficulty, 6 different characters, many Power ups, even more unique Items and more to come, Here is your One Way Ticket To the Nine Circles Of Hell.

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/XHuabzccjh
